body_html: Yes I usually set -D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0 everywhere, but that's not always the right thing. They made that change more than a year ago IIRC, so maybe clang has caught up with it. You could try 3.9? Or switch to gcc everywhere?
body_text: Yes I usually set -D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0 everywhere, but that's not always the right thing. They made that change more than a year ago IIRC, so maybe clang has caught up with it. You could try 3.9? Or switch to gcc everywhere?
body: Yes I usually set -D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0 everywhere, but that's not always the right thing. They made that change more than a year ago IIRC, so maybe clang has caught up with it. You could try 3.9? Or switch to gcc everywhere?
